headline: Clorox (CLX) Margin Surge Reinforces Profitability Narrative Despite Slower Growth Forecasts
summary: Clorox (CLX) delivered striking earnings growth this year, posting a 121.6% increase, a clear reversal from its 5-year average annual decline of 14.8%. Net profit margins have more than doubled to 11.7% from 4.8%, while the company’s Price-to-Earnings ratio stands at 17x, below both peer and industry averages. With strong earnings quality and a discounted valuation, Clorox’s latest results highlight improving profitability and operational execution, even as forward growth forecasts remain...
